mandate: Define the immutable execution rules and interface for the State Machine Controller (SMC), which enforces the GSEP-C atomic flow integrity and triggers IH upon constraint violation.

interface_methods.name: AdvanceState
interface_methods.purpose: Attempt to advance the pipeline by one stage (Si -> Si+1). Executes and validates the step defined in gsep_c_flow.json.

interface_methods.name: CommitP01Finality
interface_methods.purpose: Execute stage S11 (P-01) by verifying all GAX requirements against ACVD parameters.

interface_methods.name: AuthorizeRRP
interface_methods.purpose: Interface hook for DIAL to initiate Rollback Protocol execution only after DARM compliance is met.

atomicity_rule: No state transition Sxx -> S(x+1) can occur if a required prerequisite artifact validation fails, or if an intermediate IH trigger is invoked.
